caught-fish-modal.title: Bir balık yakaladın!
caught-fish-modal.congratulation: Tebrikler, bir balık yakaladınız! Toplamda {catch_count} balık yakaladınız.
caught-fish-modal.name: Balığın adı
caught-fish-modal.name-help: İsterseniz balığı yeniden adlandırabilirsiniz. Adının forum kurallarına uygun olduğundan emin olun.
caught-fish-modal.placement-help: Son tartışmalarda ve aktif kullanıcı profillerinde  balıkları gizleyebilirsiniz. Kendi yerleştirdiğiniz balığı yakalayamazsınız.
caught-fish-modal.submit-name-place-later: Adı kaydet ve saklama yerini seç
caught-fish-modal.submit-name-place-random: Adı kaydet ve balığın kendisini gizlemesine izin ver

edit-round.name: Adı
edit-round.name-help: Bu turun adı, pankartta ve derecelendirmede gözükecektir
edit-round.starting-pack-help: Will include a few fishes to get you started in no time

edit-fish.name: Adı
edit-fish.name-help: Balıkların şu andaki adı budur. Balıkları yeniden adlandırma iznine sahip kullanıcılar adlarını düzenleyebilir.

round-alert.message: Tur "{name}" için {time} süresi boyunca olabildiğince balık yakalayın

basket.title: Balık sepeti
basket.drag-help: Balıkları tartışma, gönderi ve ya kullanıcı profillerine sürükleyip bırakın

table-fish.title: Turdaki balıklar {name}
table-fish.name: Ad
table-fish.new-from-image: Toplu görüntü içe aktararak yeni balıklar oluşturun

page-ranking.title: Rankings
page-ranking.permission: You do not have permission to see the rankings

drop-area.message: You can drop the fish here
drop-area.missing-from-store: Could not find the fish in the data store

settings.title: Catch The Fish Settings
settings.discussion-age: How old discussions can be for a fish to be placed on it (days)
settings.post-age: How old posts can be for a fish to be placed on it (days)
settings.user-age: How long since a user must have been active for a fish to be placed on it (days)
settings.time-to-place: Time allowed to place fish before it is randomly placed (minutes)
settings.alert-round: Show an altert with the round name and duration on the homepage
settings.animate-flip: Flip fish images based on direction

permissions.participate: Participate in the rounds and catch fishes

api.wrong-catch-placement: There is no fish here. Maybe you weren't quick enough and someone else got it first
api.too-many-placement-models: Only one placement is possible at a time
api.invalid-discussion-id: Discussion doesn't seem to exist, maybe it was recently deleted
api.invalid-post-id: Post doesn't seem to exist, maybe it was recently deleted
api.invalid-user-id: User doesn't seem to exist, maybe it was recently deleted
api.model-deleted: Can't place fish on a deleted discussion or post
api.model-private: Can't place fish on a private discussion or post
api.inactive-discussion: Can't place fish on discussion inactive for more than {days} days
api.inactive-post: Can't place fish on post created more than {days} days ago
api.inactive-user: Can't place fish on user inactive for more than {days} days
api.non-comment-post: Can only place fishes on comment posts
api.user-suspended: Can't place fish on a suspended user
api.random-error: Could not generate a random fish placement
api.cannot-catch-own-fish: You cannot catch a fish you placed yourself
api.cannot-catch-hold-fish: The previous catcher needs to release the fish before you can catch it
api.fish-update-wrong-user: You can no longer edit this fish. Somebody else has probably caught it
api.fish-update-expired: Too late, you can no longer edit this fish. It has automatically been placed somewhere in the meantime
